```{r setup}
library(OmicAnalyzer)
```

```{r}
oa <- createStudy(name = "example",
                  description = "Example study for vignette")
oa <- addModels(oa, c(model_1 = "A linear model"))
```

```{r}
features <- data.frame(
  featureID = letters[1:3],
  variable = LETTERS[1:3],
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

oa <- addFeatures(oa, features)
```

```{r}
samples <- data.frame(
  sampleID = paste("sample", 1:5, sep = "_"),
  sampleVariable = LETTERS[1:5],
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

oa <- addSamples(oa, samples)
```

```{r}
assay <- matrix(rnorm(15), nrow = 3, ncol = 5,
                dimnames = list(features$featureID, samples$sampleID))

oa <- addAssays(oa, list(model_1 = assay))
```

```{r}
oa
```
